commandName.label: Command Name
commandName.tooltip: Name of the command as it will be used in chat

invalidMessage.value: Invalid command value $user, please try again!
invalidMessage.label: Invalid Value Message
invalidMessage.tooltip: Message to send if the user enters an invalid value

universalCost.label: Universal Cost
universalCost.tooltip: Set this to use one cost across all commands

cost.label: Cost
cost.tooltip: How much it costs to use this command in terms of stream currency

costMessage.label: Cost Message
costMessage.tooltip: Message to send if the user does not have enough currency to use the command

cooldown.label: Command cooldown in seconds
cooldown.tooltip: How long users must wait before using the command

cooldownMessage.label: Cooldown Message
cooldownMessage.tooltip: Message to send if command is still on user cooldown

permission.label: Permission Level
permission.tooltip: Specify the user permission level required to use this command
